title: Advanced Whitewater Skills
description: Skills for precise boat control and running harder rapids

name: playboat_skills
title: Playboat Skills
description: Basic tricks for learning to playboat

name: freestyle_types
title: Types of Freestyle
description: Playboating falls into three main categories, characterised by different moves and styles

name: boat_design
title: Boat Design
description: Breakdown of what features on boats do, what makes boats different and what they are designed for

name: kit_investment
title: Investing in Kit
description: If you're asking yourself if you should buy some kit or don't know what to get, hopefully this advice should help

name: river_features
title: Whitewater Features
subtitle: The main components of whitewater rapids
description: The main components of whitewater rapids

name: fundamentals
title: Paddling Fundamentals
subtitle: Key techniques underpinning all paddling skills
description: These basic techniques are essential for good execution of any paddling, from efficient flatwater paddling to the hardest whitewater. They are easy to learn and hard to perfect, good paddlers will practice these skills continually throughout their career

name: warwick_canoe
title: What Warwick Canoe Do
description: An overview of what events and opportunities the club offers

name: whitewater_leading
title: Leading on Whitewater
description: Good leadership is important in potentially dangerous environments like whitewater. Here are some tips on how to do it effectively. Most of this information is also very relevant for peer paddling.

name: safety_skills
title: Safety Skills
subtitle: Techniques for rescues
description: Swims and other problems inevitably happen, these resources aim to educate how to respond effectively

name: rescues
title: Rescues
subtitle: How to plan and go about a rescue
description: Things to think about before, during and after a rescue

name: rescue_scenarios
title: Rescue Scenarios
description: A selection of more common ways things can go wrong, and how to deal with them

name: safe_trips
title: Keeping Trips Safe
subtitle: How to run a trip well
description: When planning a trip either as a leader or as a peer group, there is a lot to consider to make sure accidents don't happen

name: decision_making
title: Descision Making
subtitle: How do you know you're making good choices?
description: Most paddling accidents are caused by overconfidence or lack of knowledge. Making good decisions is important but can be very difficult, especially in unfamiliar or stressful situations. Having an awareness of common mistakes and mental biases can help spot problems before they happen.

name: british_canoeing
title: British Canoeing
subtitle: Learn more about the UK's paddling authority
description: BC is the umbrella organisation for all paddlesports in the UK. Offering resources, coaching, qualifications, competitions, insurance and much more; beyond your club they are the go-to for paddling information.

name: coaching_skills
title: How to Coach Basic Skills
subtitle: A deeper dive into skills and how to coach them
description: Rather than just telling you how to do things, these pages go into a more detailed breakdown of why things work, and mistakes people commonly make trying to learn them
